name: Victoria (english)
description:
Hi everyone, I am happy to show you my next project called Victoria. It's a short first person indie horror game. The game time is something like 10 minutes, but there is a lot of work behind those 10 minutes. The game have English and Czech subtitles as well.

 Frasevc

Czech version: https://frasevc.itch.io/victoria-cz

Česká verze: https://frasevc.itch.io/victoria-cz

Story: Vlastimil, 32, is forced by his own past and memories to return to the abandoned house where he spent most of his childhood to find something to quench his guilt. He moved out of the house with his parents, who are now dead, after an unfortunate incident in which Victoria, Vlastimil's beloved older sister, died. 

In the game, you are equipped with a flashlight and a gun to defend yourself against the evil spirits.
